She has been doing this for many years, earning good money for the family and she has successfully repaid her previous loans from GDMPC. She used the previous loan to buy farm supplies. She always finds ways to improve their farm to ensure a better source of income for the family in the future. Aside from farming, she operates a food vending business and it adds cash inflows to her family. To offer more snacks, she took a new loan recently to buy additional raw ingredients to prepare snacks to sell. She hopes to gain a bigger harvest this cropping season as well as to improve sales in order to gain more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional raw ingredients to prepare snacks to sell

loans.name: Jose Jaime

texts.es: El señor Jose es de la provincia Punata del departamento de Cochabamba, se dedica a su actividad que es la crianza de gallinas (avícola) y producción de plantas frutales como ser manzana y duraznos cultivando en sus propias parcelas, el señor vive solo, sus hijos son mayores y ya se independizaron de su familia, actualmente está solicitando un crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas para aplicar a las plantas frutales y para contratar mano de obra. Tiene vivienda propia, es regular con materiales del lugar hecho por el mismo, donde no cuenta con el servicio de energía, simplemente cuenta con panel solar, el agua que utiliza es saneado y esta compartida en la comunidad. El señor tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante con su trabajo, por ello solicita el crédito para continuar con su actividad y a futuro mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Señor José is from the province of Punata in the department of Cochabamba. He works in his activities of raising chickens (poultry) and producing fruiting plants such as apples and peaches, raised on his own parcels of land. He lives alone. His children are adults and are already independent of his family. He is now applying for a loan to buy agricultural supplies to apply to the fruiting plants and to hire labor.

He has his own home. It is an ordinary house, made by himself with local materials. He does not have energy service; he simply has a solar panel. The water that he uses is sanitized and is shared in the community. He has a great will to advance with his work; for this reason he is applying for the loan to continue with his work and in the future improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy feed for his chickens and supplies for his apple and peach trees

loans.name: Anelyn

texts.en:
Anelyn is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Anelyn is 33 years old and has four children who are in school.

Anelyn has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food business.

Anelyn has been in this business for five years. In the future, Anelyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Doris

texts.en: Doris is thankful for the support of the previous loan that enabled her to increase her territory in the business. Now she comes to you requesting a new   loan of KES 20,000 to purchase one bale of second hand clothes to sell in her business.

loans.use: to purchase one bale of second hand clothes to sell

loans.name: José Neftali

texts.es:
José de 55 años de edad, es un hombre muy familiar dedicado a su hijos y esposa y su ganado ya que esto le trae muchas satisfacciones y sobre todo el orgullo de ser un esposo ejemplar, el cual a sabido crecer a sus cuatro hijos junto a su esposa. Comenta que asiste a la iglesia junto con su familia por ello sus hijos son personas de firmes principios morales y espirituales, por eso son personas de respeto y útiles a la sociedad por tanto él se siente muy orgulloso de ser padre de hijos así trabajadores y muy luchadores, 2 de ellos están en los Estados Unidos y le envían remesas las cuales le sirven para solventar algunas de sus necesidades mas básicas. 


José es un hombre muy luchador con ganas de superación, ya que su padre que en paz descanse le dejo una herencia en tierra en las cuales él trabaja muy duro con sus hijos y su esposa, por lo general ella esta realizando un trabajo muy primordial, el cual es fundamental para que José pueda mejorar, él se dedica a la ganadería y crianza de la misma en las sacateras que su padre le ha dejado, ya que el falleció hace poco y le encargo los terrenos a él. 


El préstamo se empleara para la compra de ganado para engorde, ya que tiene muchos metros cuadrados de terreno en las cuales puede engordar y después poder venderlos y así obtener ingresos los cuales puedan mejorar la calidad de vida de él y su familia.


 Sus planes a futuro son comprar mas vacas para producción de leche y la venta, ya que es su rubro principal y lo que a él le gusta es criar ganado y producir queso y crema para la venta.
texts.en:
José is 55 years old. He is a family man that is dedicated to his children, his wife, and his cattle as these bring him much satisfaction and above all the pride of being an exemplary husband. He has managed to raise his four children together with his wife. He mentioned that he attends church with his family and because of this his children are people of firm moral and spiritual principles. As such they are respectful and helpful people in society and José is very proud to be the father of children that are hard working and courageous. Two of his children are in the United States and they send him allowances that help to obtain some of his most basic needs.

José is a very courageous man with the desire to get ahead. Now that his father rests in peace, he was left an inheritance of land where he works very hard with his children and his wife. In general his wife performs very primitive work that is fundamental so that José can improve. He earns a living by raising livestock in the acres that his father left him. As he passed away recently, he left his land in the charge of José.

The loan will be used to buy more cattle to fatten. He has many square meters of land where the cattle can grow and later he can sell them and this way obtain income that will improve the quality of life for him and his family.

His plans for the future are to buy more cattle to produce milk he can sell as his main item. José likes to raise cattle and produce cheese and cream to sell.

loans.use: to buy cattle to produce milk he can sell.

loans.name: Dennis Josue

texts.es:
Dennis de 25 años de edad, es un joven que se esta superando de buena manera, ya que tiene un taller de reparación de moto taxi, el cual le genera ingresos los cuales utiliza para su alimentación y la de su familia ya que tiene una niña con su compañera de vida; su compañera de vida le ayuda en todo lo necesario para mejorar sus condiciones,  por ello él se siente muy alagado por poseer a una mujer que le apoya y lo cuida con mucha amor.  Él trabaja todos los días en su taller y todos los mototaxistas lo buscan para que les repare los vehículos. Por tanto, el nos  le va muy bien con lo que hace y así seguirá trabajando muy duro por mejorar sus condiciones. 
 
El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar un vehículo para transporte. Manifiesta que lo necesita para salir a pasear junto con su familia, así que el vehículo se utilizara para ello.

Dennis planea a futuro mejorar su negocio, comprar repuestos y ampliar sus servicios a mas clientes.
texts.en:
Dennis, who is 25-years old, is a young man who is doing very well for himself.  He has a "moto taxi" repair shop.  The shop generates the income he uses to feed himself and his family; he and his wife have a little girl.  Dennis's wife helps him with everything they need to improve their standard of living.  Dennis feels very pleased to have a women who supports him and takes care of him with such love.  Dennis works in his shop every day.  All the "moto taxi" drivers seek him out for their vehicle repairs.  As such, Dennis tells us that business is going very well for him and that he will continue working very hard to improve his standard of living. 
 
The loan that Dennis is requesting from CREDICAMPO is to purchase a vehicle.  He states that he needs it to travel with his family.  That is what it will be used for. 

Dennis plans, in the future, to improve his business, to purchase spare parts and to expand his services to more customers.

loans.use: to purchase a vehicle.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
El señor Edgar tiene 34 años, viven en pareja con la señora Maria con quien tiene 2 hijos, ambos se dedican a la confección de trajes para particulares, para agentes policiales y militares de alto rango hace mas de 10 años.
Son una pareja muy trabajadora, que está luchando para poder crecer y salir adelante y dar a sus hijos todo lo que necesitan para una vida digna y sin privaciones.
El préstamo que solicita es para la compra de telas, hilos, agujas que precisa para entregar una gran cantidad de pedidos que tiene, ambos gracias a su actividad crea fuente de trabajo para 4 personas que lo ayudan en la terminación de las prendas.
texts.en: Edgar is 34 years old and lives with his partner Maria with whom he has two children. Both of them have worked in the production of uniforms for private citizens, police officers and high ranking military officers for over 10 years. They're a very hard-working couple that's fighting for a chance to thrive, get ahead and provide their kids with everything they need to lead a respectable life free of hardships. The loan he's requesting is to purchase fabrics, threads, and needles that he needs to fulfill a huge amount of orders. Thanks to their work they create jobs for 4 people that assist them in finishing the garments.

loans.use: To buy fabrics, threads, needles, etc to make items for wholesale.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo es un microempresario emprendedor y exitoso casado, se ha dedicado a la agricultura durante toda su vida, este es un negocio heredado por sus padres, a  el socio la institución le ha brindado por trece años el financiamiento para la agricultura, por lo que los beneficios han sido múltiples, también ha demostrado ser una persona honrado y solicita el crédito para la compra de urea, abono, veneno, alquiler de terreno, arado, pago a mozos, etc.
texts.en: Gerardo is an entrepreneurial small-businessman who's successful and married, and has worked in agriculture his whole life. This is a business he inherited from his parents and for thirteen years he's received financing from the institution. The benefits of this have been many, and he's also proven himself to be an honorable man and he's requesting a loan to pay for urea, fertilizer, pesticide, land rental, plowing, hired help, etc.

loans.use: To buy urea, fertilizer, pesticides, land rental, plowing, hire workers, etc.

loans.name: Benkadi  B Group

texts.fr:
Les  10 membres du groupe  BENKADI B  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 33 ans, 3 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à KOMO, un des villages de TIELE, 2ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur sixième prêt de campagne avec l’institution.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide et le riz avec MINATA, 1ère personne debout  de la gauche vers la droite  sur la photo.
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, des semences et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  2 hectares. 
La production est vendue au niveau de TIELE, après la récolte à une clientèle composée de revendeurs et de consommateurs. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 195.000FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the group BENKADI B are married women, who average 33 years of age and three children each, all living in polygamous families in KOMO, a village in TIELE (2nd administrative region of the Republic of Mali.) The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are on their sixth loan with the institution. 

The crops grown are peanuts and rice, as is the case with MINATA (first person standing at the left in the photo). With her loan, she intends to purchase farm inputs and seeds and to cover the cost of plowing for maintaining 2 hectares. 

After the harvest, the produce is sold to a customer base composed of retailers and consumers in TIELE. She plans on making an average profit of 195,000 francs CFA per planting. This profit will enable her to pay back her loan and also to help out her husband in covering day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, farm inputs, and seeds

loans.use: to improve his home by plastering the walls and fixing the floor.

loans.name: José René

texts.es:
José de 34 años de edad, trabaja muy duro en la tierra como agricultor;  él se ha criado y fortalecido junto a su padre quien le enseño. José trabaja junto a su compañera de vida, en los quehaceres del hogar y la crianza de los niños pues cada día al rayar la aurora ella se levanta y le prepara café o chocolate caliente para que él se vaya a trabajar la tierra, ya que la agricultura es su principal fuente de ingreso y ademas remesas que  su madre recibe, sus hijos están pequeños pero ya colaboran en la casa y la agricultura familiar, trabajando muy duro con la cuma y el machete pues José le esta enseñando muy bien el trabajo para que en el futuro sean hombres de trabajo como su padre. 

 El trabaja la tierra desde que tenia 14 años trabaja la tierra junto con su padre el cual le enseño a laborar y labrar la tierra con amor y desde que se acompaño el hoy trabaja para su familia, ya que hoy tiene muchas responsabilidades con su familia, por ello lucha cada día al levantarse para así un día mas tratar de mejorar su calidad de vida junto a su familia. 


El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas, herbicidas y para consolidar una deuda.  Manifiesta que gracias al apoyo que brindan en la institución, se puede salir adelante poco a poco.


 José desea que su esposa tenga otro hijo y que su producción de maíz sea mejor.
texts.en:
José is 34 years old. As a farmer, he works very hard on the land. He grew up and became strong next to his father, who taught him. José works with his life companion, in the household tasks and raising the children, since every day at the break of dawn she gets up and prepares him coffee or hot chocolate so that he can go to work the land, since agriculture is their principal source of income, besides remittances that his mother receives. His children are little, but they help in the house and with the family agriculture, working very hard with the knife and the machete, since José is teaching them the work very well, so that in the future they will be working men like their father.

He has worked the land since he was 14 years old, working alongside his father, who taught him to work and to farm the land with love. Since he got married, he now works for his family, since he has many responsibilities with his family. For that reason, he strives every day to get up to try one more day to improve his quality of life along with his family.

The loan that he is applying for from CrediCampo is to buy compost, fertilizer, pesticides, and herbicides and to pay off a debt. He states that thanks to the support that they offer in the institution, he can advance little by little.

José hopes that his wife will have another child and that his production of corn will be better.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizer, pesticides, and herbicides and to pay off a debt.

loans.name: Benkadi  A Group

texts.fr:
Les  10 membres du groupe  BENKADI A  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 33 ans, 3 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à KOMO, un des villages de TIELE, 2ème région administrative du Mali.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase blouses, shirts and pants.

loans.name: Kleber Fernando

texts.es:
Klever tiene 45 años de edad vive en el cantón San Miguel provincia de Bolivar estado civil casado vive con sus tres hijo y su esposo. 
Pertenece a la ventanilla rural Las Guardias, que esta se dedica a las labores agricolas.
Tiene una tienda de viveres se dedica a la agricultura siembra papas, frejol y mora.
También a la cría de animales como chancho y gallinas.
El utilizara el dinero del crédito para su tienda y para la siembra de papas
Con el apoyo del crédito podrá realizar las cosas que no podía sin el, como poder incrementar su negocio familiar, realiza sus compras en las Guardias con una frecuencia de 8 días.
su sueño es tener su casa propia. En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en: Klever is 45 years old and lives in the San Miguel Canton in the Bolivar province. As far as marital status he's married and lives with his wife and three children. He belongs to the Ventanilla Rural community organization that supports agricultural work. He has a grocery store and his agricultural work consists of planting potatoes, beans, and berries. Also he works in raising animals such as pigs and chickens. He'll use the loan money for his store and planting potatoes. With the aid of the loan he'll be able to do things to he wouldn't be able to otherwise, such as boost his family business. He does his shopping at Guardias once a week. His dream is to have a house of his own. In his free time he enjoys sports.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for the store.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, farm inputs, and seeds

loans.name: Claudia Urania

texts.es: Claudia es una microempresaria emprendedora de 23 años de edad y madre de tres hijos, quienes han sido motivos para su superación, es propietaria de una pulpería desde hace dos años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, sal, gaseosas, chiverías, medicamentos variados, gaseosas, lácteos, etc.
texts.en: Claudia is an enterprising small-businesswoman who's 23 years old and is a mother of three children.  They are the reason that drives her self-improvement. She's owned a grocery store for two years and is requesting a loan to purchase rice, beans, sugar, salt, soft drinks, sweets, various medicines, dairy products, etc.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics like deodorants and perfume, children's clothing, soft drinks, rice, sugar, oil, beans, sweets, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Sebastian

texts.es:
Sebastián es un campesino, humilde y trabajador con el empuje y verraquera que distingue a los hombres y mujeres del campo de Colombia.
Es un joven de mente emprendedora y desde muy pequeño aprendió todos los oficios del campo como cultivos y crianza de animales, tanto así que hoy en día tiene su propio cultivo mora que aprendió a cultivar al lado de su padre; alimentos que vende en la plaza de mercado del municipio de La Ceja, Antioquia.
Este personaje tiene como propósito aumentar sus cultivos y mejorar el proceso de recolección de los mismos y es por eso que acude a la ayuda de un crédito para la compra de insumos agropecuarios como fertilizantes, compra de canastas para la recolección de las moras, alambre para su siembra y semillas de mora para continuar con sus cultivos.
El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de progresar como empresario y como persona, además de aumentar sus ingresos y seguir aportando el sustento en su hogar.
Él lo único que quiere es poder mejorar la calidad de vida de él y su familia por la cual ha luchado incansablemente.
texts.en:
Sebastian is a farmer, humble and hardworking, with the drive and spirit that distinguish the men and women of Colombia's countryside. He is a young man with an entrepreneurial mind and at a very young age learned all of the trades of the countryside such as farming and animal husbandry, so much so that today he has his own blackberry field which he learned to cultivate alongside his father. He sells his produce in the market square of the municipality of La Ceja, Antioquia.

He has a goal to grow his crops and improve his collection process, and for this reason he is seeking the help of a loan for the purchase of agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, baskets for the collection of blackberries, wire for planting, and blackberry seeds to continue his cultivations.

The loan will give him the opportunity to progress as a businessman and as a person, in addition to increasing his income and contributing to the sustenance of his home.

His only desire is to be able to improve his and his family's quality of life, for which he has struggled tirelessly.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies, baskets, wire and blackberry seeds.

loans.name: William De Jesus

texts.es:
William es un hombre pujante, servicial y trabajador, a sus 67 años de edad, ha podido sacar su negocio adelante con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación.
Desde hace 20 años se desempeña hábilmente en el campo de la sastrería, prestando el servicio de reformas, modificación y arreglos a las prendas de clientes directos, el oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica y trabaja solo todos los días, así genera los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposa con la carga económica del hogar.
Actualmente se motiva a solicitar el crédito para comprar insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, resorte, entre otros) esto le permitirá tener material disponible para cumplir con la entrega oportuna de los pedidos que tiene pendientes, logrando fidelizar sus clientes actuales.
William manifiesta que desea continuar realizando su labor con mucho empeño, pues quiere ampliar su negocio y poder generar oportunidades de empleo, además de garantizar una estabilidad económica para dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: William is a vigorous, helpful and hard-working man who has pushed his business forward at the age of 67 with lots of effort and dedication. For 20 years he has worked skillfully as a tailor providing garment alteration and repair services for direct customers. He learned the trade through experience and works by himself every day. That's how he generates enough income to help his wife with household expenses. Currently his motivation for requesting a loan is the purchase of wholesale supplies (fabrics, threads, elastic, among other things) which will allow him to have material on-hand to fulfill pending orders in a timely fashion, thus earning the loyalty of his current customers. William expresses that he wishes to continue working hard since he wants to grow his business and create jobs, in addition to guaranteeing financial stability and providing his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy supplies for garment production.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en: Emily's husband is a farmer and she helped him working in their own farm to make a living. Her previous loans from GDMPC were used for farming and she has successfully repaid them with her generated revenue. Assuring to have a better source of income for the family, she took a new loan again to purchase  fertilizer such as manure. Manure helps to restore farm nutrients that brings better farm produce. In her determination to see her children be successful, she hopes to gain more income from her farm to save a portion for their future education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, such as manure, to use on her family farm.

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es:
Sandra es una mujer emprendedora y dinámica de 32 años de edad, en estos momentos se dedica a ser comerciante independiente; ya que desde hace 10 años comenzó a vender mercancía a sus familiares, amigos y compañeros de la universidad, con el fin de generar ingresos para aportar a la economía de su hogar y para pagar sus estudios.
El crédito que solicita es un apoyo para fortalecer su negocio, pues se le presentó la oportunidad de comprar unos lotes de mercancía a muy buenos precios, por lo que invertirá el dinero en la compra de surtido al por mayor (jeans, camisas, camisetas) y ajustará el capital de trabajo con unos ahorros para poder comenzar a generar recursos en su trabajo, brindando mayor comodidad y un mejor servicio a sus clientes, lo que hará más rentable su negocio.
Sandra tiene el firme propósito de sacar adelante su proyecto productivo, pues quiere convertirse en una empresaria exitosa y garantizar una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar para su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Sandra is an entrepreneurial and dynamic 32-year-old woman. At the moment she makes a living as an independent merchant, since 10 years ago she began selling merchandise to her family, friends and university classmates, with the goal of generating income to support her household and pay for her education.

She is requesting a loan to strengthen her business, since she has been presented with the opportunity to buy merchandise lots at very good prices. She will invest the money in the purchase of assortment at wholesale (jeans, shirts, t-shirts), and she will complement the working capital with her savings to offer greater convenience and better service to her customers, which will make her business more profitable.

Sandra has the firm intention of pushing forward this project to increase her productivity, because she wishes to become a successful businesswoman and guarantee a better quality of life and the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to buy wholesale merchandise to sell

loans.name: Carlos Ricardo

texts.es:
Si alguien está al tanto de los avances tecnológicos esa persona es Carlos Ricardo, un joven de 22 años, que siempre se ha visto involucrado y apasionado por los nuevos inventos. Su amor por la tecnología lo llevo a estudiar tecnología en sistema, cursa su cuarto año universitario en modo sabatino. Una de sus metas es crear un nuevo sistema operativo, con la ayuda de varios compañeros han ido trabajando paso a paso dicho proyecto, con el cual esperan obtener buenos resultados. Al mismo tiempo agradece el apoyo de su madre, quien ha sido un pilar importante en su formación.
Carlos solicita el crédito para el pago de los aranceles universitarios, él deposita su confianza en el financiamiento puesto que le apoyarán en el cumplimiento de uno de sus grandes sueños, que es la culminación de su carrera universitaria. Es un joven entusiasta e inteligente, además asegura que con la formación educativa que ha recibido se siente capacitado para desempeñar sus habilidades en el mundo laboral. En sus planes futuros está, establecer un negocio y crear nuevos sistemas.
texts.en:
If anyone is on top of technological advances, that person is Carlos Ricardo, a 22-year-old young man, who always has been involved in and passionate about new inventions. His love for technology led him to study systems technology, and he is currently in his fourth year at the university taking weekend courses. One of his goals is to create a new operating system. With the help of various partners he has been working step-by-step on this project, with which he hopes to obtain good results. At the same time, he is grateful for the support of his mother, who has been an important pillar in his formation.

Carlos requests the loan to pay for his university tuition. He trusts that he will receive the financing, given that it will help him achieve of one of his greatest dreams, the completion of his university degree. He is an enthusiastic and intelligent young man, and feels that with his education he will be prepared to employ his skills in the workplace. Among his future plans, he hopes to establish a business and create new systems.

loans.use: to pay for his university tuition

loans.name: Anne

texts.en:
Anne is a 26 year old woman, married to Douglas, who adds additional income to cater for their family's daily expenses. They are blessed with one child whom they are providing with her daily basic needs.

Anne has been running a grocery stall for the past four years earning an income of KES 8,000 at the end of every month, and has applied for her first loan of KES 20,000 with VisionFund Kenya. Anne intends to use the entire loan amount to buy potatoes, tomatoes, onions, vegetables and cereal grains for selling to her customers on a daily basis.

With the anticipated profits, Anne will be able to educate her child and construct a permanent stall to stock her groceries and food in a conducive, clean place. Anne hopes to build permanent houses for rental purposes in the near future.

loans.use: to buy green vegetables, tomatoes, potatoes, onions and cereal grains to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Mary Joy

texts.en: Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, Mary Joy, a 39-year-old mother, has been engaged in a vegetable-vending business to generate income. She aims to earn a higher income in order to meet her family's needs and support the education of her four children. Having inadequate capital, she would like to avail herself of a loan of 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy various fruits and vegetables to resell. Being a hardworking mother, she hopes to improve her business and make it more profitable in the future.

loans.use: to buy various fruits and vegetables to resell

loans.name: Maria Alicia

texts.es: Maria de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijas, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran salir adelante con los gastos que se les presentan en el hogar, Maria está solicitando un crédito para la compra de abonos, foliares, insecticidas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder hacer su siembra y así poder tener junto con su familia una mejor estabilidad económica sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Maria is 33 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and their two daughters.  She makes a living growing corn.  With what she earns from her sales and with the help of her husband, they have been able to stay on top of expenses that come up in their home.  Maria is requesting a loan to buy manures, fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides, etc. and to improve the land shown in the photo, so she can use the sown land and so she and her family can have better economic stability without limitations.

loans.use: to buy manures, fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides, etc. and to improve the land

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a baking stove, ice machine and refrigerator.

loans.name: Saida

texts.en:
Saida was born in the year 1990. She is a very hardworking woman. Saida is married but she does not have any children. She has been busy with animal husbandry for more than three years. She began her business three years ago because she needed to earn money. Saida’s husband is a kind young man but he has a small income. 

She buys cattle, feeds them for a month and resells in a local market. She uses the profit of her business to buy food items for her family. She is going to increase working capital and maximize profit. She is asking for a loan of 5,000 Somoni to buy cattle. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy cattle for increasing her working capital

loans.name: Sauda

texts.en:
Sauda is a 29-year-old married lady with three children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She deals in retail, the business she started with a hope of employing herself on realizing that her husband's income could not fully be enough for their family. She faces challenges of bad debtors and limited capital that lead her to making losses. 

Sauda needs a loan to fulfill her dream of buying a plot of land for expansion.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land for expansion.

loans.name: Semiha

texts.en:
Semiha has three children. When she lost her husband in a workplace accident, she began to work to make money. She struggled to make ends meet, and felt like she had to do something. When she saw that women were sellers at stands by the seaside, she believed that she could do it as well and decided to sell readymade jewelry and accessories. She received permission from the municipality to open a stand by the coast and began to sell jewelry. In the summer, the coast is bustling, and the stands can do business until 3 in the morning. Semiha has earned a living for the past seven years in this way. 

With the loan, she will travel to another city and buy a variety of jewelry. She believes that if she has a large variety of jewelry, then her sales, and thus her income, will increase. As long as she is healthy, she plans to continue working and operate her stand every summer. Her stand gives her life.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 

Semiha Hanım eşini bir iş kazasında kaybedince  ekonomik sebelerden işe başlıyor.  Eşini kaybedince maddi olarak sıkıntı çekiyor bir şeyler yapmasi gerekitiğini düşünüyor.  Sahildeki stantlarda da kadınların satış yaptığını görünce bende  yapabilirim diye düşünüyor.  Hazır takı ve aksesuar satmaya kara veriyor. Sahilde ki tezgahlardan belediyeden yer talep ediyor.  Burada hazır takı çeşitleri satmaya başlıyor.Yazın sahil çok hareketli ve güzel geçer, gece saat üçlere kadar tezgahlarda satışlar yapılır.  Semiha Hanım da Yedi yıldır burada satış yaparak geçimine katkıda bulunuyor.  Kredi ile değişik takılar alacak.  Çeşidini  arttıracak.  Çeşidi çok olursa ,satışınin da çok olucağını, böyle olunca da kazancınn artacağını,Daha çok gelir elde edeceğini belirtti.  Sağlığı el verdikçe çalışmak,işini yapmaya devam etmek.  Tezgahını her yaz açmak istiyor.  Tezgahın da hayat buluyor.

loans.use: to buy different jewelry to increase her selection.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita owns and operates a business planting and harvesting a variety of vegetables for sale. Lolita has been engaged in farming for many years and earns well for the family. 

Improving her farm becomes easier with access to loans from GDMPC. She had successfully repaid her previous loans used for farming. To gain a bigger harvest, she took a new loan to finance fertilizers and other expenses for the farm. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the farm to improve the general living standards of her family.

loans.use: to finance fertilizers and other expenses on her farm

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a 42-year-old married lady with three children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She operates a restaurant business alongside farming to make ends meet. She faces challenges of weather changes and dust, since her restaurant is near the highway. However, she has hopes of building a very good house and transforming her business into a modernized restaurant. 

Joyce needs a loan to buy food for the restaurant to sell.

loans.use: to buy food for the restaurant to sell.

loans.name: Et

texts.en:
Et, who is a 43-year-old married woman, is a hardworking farmer in a small rice field near her house. Her husband, Rern, is a construction worker for one private company. This couple is living with four children in a community of Prey Chhor District, Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. The total earnings of her family are approximately $7 a day.

Et’s house is located not so close to a water source, so it is not quite easy for her to get the water. To deal with this obstacle, she would like to get a Kiva loan now in order dig a well​ near her house for the sake of her family members. She would like to thank all lenders for their generosity in providing such a great loan for poor people like her.

loans.use: to dig a well near her house for the sake of her family members

loans.name: Nhóm 4 Thôn 2 Quảng Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hợi works in agriculture, raising poultry. Hợi has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Hợi faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

Hợi is 42 years old, and she is married with three children. She is the leader of a six-member group, the Nhóm 4 thôn 2 Quảng Hải solidarity group. 

She lives and works in Quang Xuong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province. In 2013, Hợi joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hợi has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Hợi hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
As a married parent of 13 children, Rosita works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from her general store. Rosita is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy fishing nets for her fishing business.

Rosita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets

loans.name: Criselda

texts.en:
Criselda is 44 years old and married with one child who is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  

Criselda has a manicure weaving business in the Philippines. Criselda requested a 7,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan amount through NWTF in order to buy new tools and equipment for her manicure business.

Criselda has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, Criselda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy new tools and equipment for her manicure business.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam has operated a food selling business, making dumplings and flat bread to sell. She sells from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. 

She is coming to you requesting a loan of Kshs 40,000 to purchase bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat and sugar for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat and sugar.

loans.name: Nhóm 5 Thôn 2 Quảng Hải Group

texts.en:
Chiến works in agriculture raising poultry. She is applying for a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future. 

Chiến is 41 years old and married with three children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 5 Thôn 2 Quảng Hải solidarity group, which consists of five members. Chiến lives with three dependents in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Chiến joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Chiến has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Chiến has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Chiến faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Chiến hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Mwanaisha

texts.en:
Mwanaisha is a 51-year-old woman, married to Yusuf, who adds an additional income to support their well being. They are blessed with one child. Mwanaisha has been running a water distribution business along with rental as a secondary business for a period of five years, earning an income of KES 10,000 at the end of every month.

Mwanaisha is now servicing her third loan of KES 20,000 with VisionFund Kenya and intends to use this entire amount to purchase additional water jerricans to replace the worn and broken jerricans which cannot be used by her customers.

Mwanaisha plans to use the anticipated income to educate her child, and hopes to become a successful businesswoman with a bright future by building rental houses in the nearby towns.

loans.use: to buy additional water jerricans

loans.name: Nhóm 06 Thôn 07 Quảng Lưu Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Lam works in agriculture, raising poultry. Lam has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

Lam is 39 years old, and she is married with two children. Lam is the group leader of the Nhóm 06 Thôn 07 Quảng Lưu solidarity group, which consists of four members. 

This is Lam's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Lam hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Jennylisa

texts.en:
Jennylisa is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Jennylisa is 32 years old and has three children who are currently in school.

Jennylisa has a fishing business in the Philippines. Jennylisa requested a 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan amount through NWTF to buy additional materials and gear for her fishing business.

Jennylisa has been in this business for four years. In the future, Jennylisa would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional materials and gear for her fishing business

loans.name: Lillian

texts.en:
Lillian operated a poultry selling business, which has been operational for the past few years. She mentioned a disease outbreak causing losses as a challenge in the business. Lillian dreams of becoming a wholesaler of poultry in the future. 

Here again she comes to you requesting another loan of Kshs 10,000. She wants to purchase poultry feed for her chickens. She joined Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase poultry feed for her chickens.

loans.name: Jeniffer

texts.en: Jeniffer is a 42-year-old hardworking lady with 10 children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She deals in baking pancakes, bargia, cassava and mandazi, along with selling fresh foods. She faces the challenge of low capital. As a loving mother, she hopes to educate all her children to higher levels of learning. Jeniffer needs a loan to buy baking products like cooking oil for using in her business.

loans.use: to buy baking products like cooking oil

loans.name: Tita

texts.en:
Tita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 30,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) through NWTF to buy additional bundles of fish net for her fishing business.

Tita has been in this business for 40 years. Tita earns more income from farming vegetables.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional bundles of fish net
